Package ly.priv.mobile

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BuildConfig  
    FacebookLinkGrabberService
    Authenticates user with Facebook and grabs Privly links from message inbox.
    Home
    Displays the Home Activity for a user after authentication.
    JsObject
    Acts as a bridge between the Js of the Privly Posting and Reading Applications and the native Android functions.
    LinksDbHelper
    Helper class for managing the database.
    Login
    Displays the login screen.
    NewPost
    Allows the user to create new Privly Content.
    PrivlyActivity
    Redirects user to Login Login Screen or Settings Settings Screen to setup the domain name with which the application works.
    PrivlyLinkStorageContract
    Defines Table and Column Names for the Privly Db.
    PrivlyLinkStorageContract.LinksDb  
    R  
    R.attr  
    R.color  
    R.dimen  
    R.drawable  
    R.id  
    R.layout  
    R.string  
    R.style  
    R.styleable  
    Settings
    Shows the Settings Activity.
    Share
    Shows the newly generated Privly URL and allows the user to share it to various platforms.
    ShowContent
    Displays the Home Activity for a user after authentication.
    TwitterHelperMethods
    Provides access to methods required by the TwitterLinkGrabberService
    TwitterLinkGrabberService
    Grabs Privly links from a twitter user's timeline and stores them in the local database.
    Utilities
    Contains simple functions that should be used wherever possible.
    Values
    Used to set/get values that should be accessible to all classes throughout the application.
